00030   HoldScanAnalysis::HoldScanAnalysis() 
00031     : VRawADCValueProcessor("HoldScanAnalysis"),
00032       _histGroupKey(type()),
00033       _feConfChange(this, &HoldScanAnalysis::feConfChanged ),
00034       _nHist(0)
00035       //      _experimentalSetupChange(this,&HoldScanAnalysis::experimentalSetupChanged)
00036   {
00037 
00038     _description = "HoldScanAnalysis" ;
00039 
00040 
00041     _signalHistPar.clear();
00042     _signalHistPar.push_back(1000);
00043     _signalHistPar.push_back(0);
00044     _signalHistPar.push_back(3000);
00045     registerOptionalParameter( "SignalBinning" , 
00046                                "The binning of the Signal histograms of individual hits" ,
00047                                _signalHistPar ,
00048                                _signalHistPar ,
00049                                _signalHistPar.size() ) ;
00050 
00051 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00052     _clusterSignalHistPar.clear();
00053     _clusterSignalHistPar.push_back(1000);
00054     _clusterSignalHistPar.push_back(0);
00055     _clusterSignalHistPar.push_back(3000);
00056     registerOptionalParameter( "ClusterSignalBinning" , 
00057                                "The binning of the total cluster signal histogram" ,
00058                                _clusterSignalHistPar ,
00059                                _clusterSignalHistPar ,
00060                                _clusterSignalHistPar.size() ) ;
00061 #endif
00062 
00063     _minNumberOfHits = 3;
00064     registerProcessorParameter( "MinNumberOfHits" , 
00065                                "Minimum number of hits of accepted clusters" ,
00066                                _minNumberOfHits ,
00067                                _minNumberOfHits) ;
00068 
00069     _minClusterSignal = 30*3;
00070     registerProcessorParameter( "MinimumSiginal" , 
00071                                "Minimum total signal of accepted clusters." ,
00072                                _minClusterSignal ,
00073                                _minClusterSignal) ;
00074 
00075     _clusterColName="EcalClusters";
00076     registerProcessorParameter( "ClusterCollectionName" , 
00077                                "The name of the cluster collection" ,
00078                                _clusterColName ,
00079                                _clusterColName);
00080 
00081     _feConfColName=COL_EMC_FE_CONF;
00082     registerProcessorParameter( "FeCollectionName" , 
00083                                "The name of the front-end configuration data collection" ,
00084                                _feConfColName ,
00085                                _feConfColName);
00086 
00087     registerProcessorParameter( "HistogramGroupName" , 
00088                                "The name of the histogram group to which the signal histograms will be assigned." ,
00089                                 _histGroupKey.nameStorage(),
00090                                 type() );
00091     _nHistMax = 20;
00092     registerProcessorParameter( "NumberOfHistograms" , 
00093                                "Maximum number of histograms to be used for signals per hold value." ,
00094                                _nHistMax ,
00095                                _nHistMax) ;
00096 
00097     _histKey[kHistSignalPerHoldValue]=histmgr::Key_t("SignalPerHoldValue");
00098     _histKey[kHistTotalSignalPerHoldValue]=histmgr::Key_t("TotalSignalPerHoldValue");
00099  }

00105   void HoldScanAnalysis::createHistograms()
00106   {
00107     histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
00108     if (_mapping.getNModules()<=0) {
00109       histogramList->createHistogramGroup(_histGroupKey);
00110     }
00111     else {
00112       std::cout << "--- " << name() << " Notification:" << std::endl;
00113       std::cout << " -  create Histograms." << std::endl;
00114       
00115       lcio::IntVec n_hist_arr;
00116       for (UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<_mapping.getNModules(); module_i++) {
00117         n_hist_arr.push_back(_nHistMax);
00118       }
00119       histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey, _histKey[kHistSignalPerHoldValue], n_hist_arr,
00120                                                        HistPar((UInt_t) _signalHistPar[0], _signalHistPar[1], _signalHistPar[2]));
00121 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00122       histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey, _histKey[kHistTotalSignalPerHoldValue], _nHistMax + 1,
00123                                                        HistPar((UInt_t) _clusterSignalHistPar[0], _clusterSignalHistPar[1], _clusterSignalHistPar[2]));
00124 #endif
00125     }
00126   }
00127 
00128   void HoldScanAnalysis::init() {
00129     printParameters();
00130 
00131     createHistograms();
00132 
00133     // empty clusters should not exist anyway.
00134     if (_minNumberOfHits<=0) _minNumberOfHits=1;
00135 
00136     _nClusters=0;
00137     _nMissingHoldChanges=0;
00138     _moduleIndexOutOfRange=0;
00139     _nBeamOrCosmicsEvents=0;
00140     _currentCommonHoldStart=static_cast<UInt_t>(-1);
00141 
00142     histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
00143 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00144     // some isolated histograms
00145     _nHitsHistogram=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey, histmgr::Key_t("HoldScanClusterNHits"),1,HistPar(200,-.5,200-.5));
00146     _clusterSignalHistogram=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey, histmgr::Key_t("HoldScanClusterSignal"),1,
00147                                                             HistPar((UInt_t) _clusterSignalHistPar[0], _clusterSignalHistPar[1], 
00148                                                                     _clusterSignalHistPar[2]));
00149 #endif
00150     _holdValueContainer=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey, histmgr::Key_t("HoldValueContainer"),1,HistPar(_nHistMax,-.5,_nHistMax-.5));
00151 
00152     if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &_feConfChange,
00153                                                               _feConfColName )) {
00154       std::cout << "HoldScan::init> no conditions data handler for collection " << _feConfColName 
00155                 << ". The conditions data may be generated by the converter if the native files are read." << std::endl;
00156     }
00157 
00158     VRawADCValueProcessor::init();
00159   }
00160 
00161   void HoldScanAnalysis::processEvent( LCEvent * evtP ) {
00162     if (evtP) {
00163       try {
00164 
00165         UInt_t reco_state=static_cast<UInt_t>(evtP->getParameters().getIntVal(PAR_RECO_STATE));
00166         if (reco_state!=kRecoStateBeam && reco_state!=kRecoStateCosmics) return;
00167 
00168         _nBeamOrCosmicsEvents++;
00169 
00170         LCCollection* col_cluster = evtP->getCollection( _clusterColName ) ;
00171         histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
00172         histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & signal_per_module_per_hold=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kHistSignalPerHoldValue]);
00173         histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & total_signal_per_module_per_hold=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kHistTotalSignalPerHoldValue]);
00174         if (col_cluster->getNumberOfElements()>0) {
00175 
00176           for (UInt_t element_i=0; element_i< static_cast<UInt_t>(col_cluster->getNumberOfElements()); element_i++) {
00177             EVENT::Cluster *a_cluster=dynamic_cast<EVENT::Cluster *>(col_cluster->getElementAt(element_i));
00178             if (a_cluster) {
00179 
00180               Double_t energy_sum=0;
00181               const EVENT::CalorimeterHitVec &a_hit_col=a_cluster->getCalorimeterHits();
00182               if (a_hit_col.size() >= static_cast<UInt_t>(_minNumberOfHits)) {
00183                 for (EVENT::CalorimeterHitVec::const_iterator hit_iter=a_hit_col.begin();
00184                      hit_iter!=a_hit_col.end();
00185                      hit_iter++) {
00186                   //              CellIndex geom_cell_index((*hit_iter)->getCellID0());
00187                   //std::pair<UInt_t,UInt_t> module_and_cell_index=_indexLookup.getModuleAndCellIndex(_mapping,geom_cell_index);
00188                   if ((*hit_iter)->getEnergy()>0.) {
00189                     
00190                     energy_sum+=(*hit_iter)->getEnergy();
00191                   }
00192                 }
00193                 
00194 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00195                 dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_clusterSignalHistogram->getElementAt(0))->fill(energy_sum);
00196 #endif
00197                 if (energy_sum>_minClusterSignal) {
00198 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00199                   dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_nHitsHistogram->getElementAt(0))->fill(a_hit_col.size());
00200 #endif
00201                   for (EVENT::CalorimeterHitVec::const_iterator hit_iter=a_hit_col.begin();
00202                        hit_iter!=a_hit_col.end();
00203                        hit_iter++) {
00204                     CellIndex geom_cell_index((*hit_iter)->getCellID0());
00205                     
00206                     std::pair<UInt_t, UInt_t> module_and_cell_index=_indexLookup.getModuleAndCellIndex(_mapping,geom_cell_index);
00207                     if (module_and_cell_index.first >= _histogramIndex.size()) {
00208                       _moduleIndexOutOfRange++;
00209                     }
00210                     else {
00211                       signal_per_module_per_hold.histogram(module_and_cell_index.first,_histogramIndex[module_and_cell_index.first])->fill((*hit_iter)->getEnergy());
00212                     }
00213                   }
00214                   if (_currentCommonHoldStart<static_cast<UInt_t>(-1)) {
00215                     total_signal_per_module_per_hold.histogram(_currentCommonHoldStart)->fill(energy_sum);
00216                   }
00217                   _nClusters++;
00218                 }
00219               }
00220             }
00221           }
00222         }
00223       }
00224       catch (lcio::DataNotAvailableException &err) {
00225       }
00226     }
00227   }

00229   void HoldScanAnalysis::moduleTypeChanged(lcio::LCCollection* col) {
00230     VRawADCValueProcessor::moduleTypeChanged(col);
00231     if (_mapping.isModuleConditionsDataComplete()) {
00232       _indexLookup.createIndexReverseLookup(_mapping);
00233       createHistograms();
00234     }
00235   }

00237   void HoldScanAnalysis::moduleLocationChanged(lcio::LCCollection* col) {
00238     VRawADCValueProcessor::moduleLocationChanged(col);
00239     if (_mapping.isModuleConditionsDataComplete()) {
00240       _indexLookup.createIndexReverseLookup(_mapping);
00241       createHistograms(); 
00242     }
00243   }

00245   void HoldScanAnalysis::moduleConnectionChanged(lcio::LCCollection* col) {
00246     VRawADCValueProcessor::moduleConnectionChanged(col);
00247     if (_mapping.isModuleConditionsDataComplete()) {
00248       _indexLookup.createIndexReverseLookup(_mapping);
00249       createHistograms();
00250     }
00251   }

00254   void HoldScanAnalysis::end() 
00255   {
00256     std::cout << "--- " << name() << " Report:" << std::endl
00257               << std::setw(8) << _nClusters << " clusters used." << std::endl
00258               << std::setw(8) << _moduleIndexOutOfRange << " hits for which the module index was out of the allowed range." << std::endl
00259               << std::setw(8) << _nMissingHoldChanges << " configuration changes in which hold values were changed only for some modules." << std::endl
00260               << std::setw(8) << _nBeamOrCosmicsEvents << " beam or cosmics events." << std::endl
00261               << std::endl;
00262 
00263     // write out the mean signal 
00264     histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
00265     histmgr::HistogramCollection_t & signal_per_module_per_hold=histogramList->getHistogramCollection(_histGroupKey,_histKey[kHistSignalPerHoldValue]);
00266     for (UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<signal_per_module_per_hold.nMajor(); module_i++) {
00267       std::cout << "Module " << module_i << ":" << std::endl;
00268       for (std::map<int,UInt_t>::const_iterator hist_iter=_holdStartMap.begin();
00269            hist_iter!=_holdStartMap.end();
00270            hist_iter++) {
00271         //      std::cout << hist_iter->first << ":" << std::endl;
00272         histmgr::FloatHistogram1D *histP=signal_per_module_per_hold.histogram(module_i,hist_iter->second);
00273         std::cout << module_i << ":"   << hist_iter->first << ":" << histP->mean() << "+-" << histP->rms() << std::endl;
00274       }
00275       std::cout << std::endl;
00276     }
00277 
00278     std::cout << std::endl;
00279 
00280   }
00281 
00282   void HoldScanAnalysis::feConfChanged(EVENT::LCCollection *col) 
00283   {
00284     _histogramIndex.resize(_mapping.getNModules(),0);
00285     UInt_t hold_changes=0;
00286     Bool_t same_hold=true;
00287     UInt_t last_hold_start=static_cast<UInt_t>(-1);
00288     UInt_t last_histogram_index=_nHistMax;
00289     for (UInt_t fe_i=0; fe_i< static_cast<UInt_t>(col->getNumberOfElements()); fe_i++) {
00290       CALICE::FeConfigurationBlock fe_conf(col->getElementAt(fe_i));
00291       std::pair<UInt_t,UInt_t> module_index_left_right=_mapping.getModuleIndex(fe_conf.getCrateID(),fe_conf.getSlotID(),fe_conf.getBoardComponentNumber());
00292       // DEBUG
00293       for (UInt_t i=0; i<2; i++) {
00294         UInt_t module_index=(i==0 ? module_index_left_right.first : module_index_left_right.second);
00295         if (module_index<_mapping.getNModules()) {
00296           UInt_t hold_start=static_cast<UInt_t>(fe_conf.getHoldStart());
00297           if (last_hold_start!=hold_start && last_hold_start!=static_cast<UInt_t>(-1)) {
00298             same_hold=false;
00299           }
00300           last_hold_start=hold_start;
00301           UInt_t hist_index=0;
00302           std::map<int,UInt_t>::const_iterator iter=_holdStartMap.find(hold_start);
00303           if (iter == _holdStartMap.end()) {
00304             if ( _nHist < static_cast<UInt_t>(_nHistMax) ) {
00305               std::pair< std::map<int,UInt_t>::const_iterator, bool > res=_holdStartMap.insert(std::make_pair<int,UInt_t>(hold_start, _nHist++));
00306               if (res.second) {
00307                 hist_index = res.first->second;
00308 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00309                 assert(_holdValueContainer->getNumberOfElements()==1);
00310 #endif        
00311                 histmgr::FloatHistogram1D *histP=dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_holdValueContainer->getElementAt(0));
00312                 if (hist_index<histP->nBins()) {
00313                   histP->setBinContent(histP->firstBinIndex()+hist_index,hold_start);
00314                 }
00315                 else {
00316                   histP->addToBinContent(histP->firstBinIndex(),1);
00317                 }
00318               }
00319               else {
00320                 _nHist--;
00321 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00322                 assert(_holdValueContainer->getNumberOfElements()==1);
00323 #endif        
00324                 histmgr::FloatHistogram1D *histP=dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_holdValueContainer->getElementAt(0));
00325                 histP->addToBinContent(histP->firstBinIndex(),1);
00326               }
00327             }
00328           }
00329           else {
00330             hist_index=iter->second;
00331             last_histogram_index=hist_index;
00332           }
00333           if (hist_index!=_histogramIndex[module_index]) {
00334             //DEBUG         
00335             //      std::cout << "hold change:: "
00336             //                << "crate=" << fe_conf.getCrateID() << " slot=" << fe_conf.getSlotID() << " fe=" << fe_conf.getBoardComponentNumber()
00337             //                << " label=" << fe_conf.getRecordLabel() << " hold_start=" << fe_conf.getHoldStart() 
00338             //                << " -> " << hist_index
00339             //                << std::endl;
00340             _histogramIndex[module_index]=hist_index;
00341             hold_changes++;
00342           }
00343         }
00344       }
00345     }
00346     _currentCommonHoldStart=(last_histogram_index < static_cast<UInt_t>(_nHistMax) ? last_histogram_index : static_cast<UInt_t>(_nHistMax));
00347     if (hold_changes!=_mapping.getNModules()) {
00348       _nMissingHoldChanges++;
00349     }
00350   }
